reviews.comments: Si quisiera experimentar  Bs As, me alojaria en casa de Maria  y seguiria sin dudar su guia y consejos. Es una experta y la casa es unica!!
Súper recomendable. La veracidad de l propuesta es impecable.
Deberias manejar un petit Hotel!! Muchas gracias por todo.
Me alojo muy a menudo en la Casa de María por motivos de trabajo, es siempre todo perfecto!
El alojamiento de María está muy bien ubicado. La pase muy lindo! Nos vemos la próxima!!!
Como siempre, todo perfecto! Excelente comunicación, coordinamos muy bien ingreso y salida. Maria es muy practica y gentil. Siempre vuelvo!

Excelente estadía, la casa es tan bonita como en las fotos. Maria es una persona muy amable y atenta, nos dio mucho espacio en su hogar y nos sentimos muy cómodos. Excelente ubicación para los turistas, ademas de que la anfitriona ofrece una completa guía de la ciudad y una SUBE para utilizar el transporte publico, nos pareció un gran detalle.
Maria es muy silenciosa y respetuosa de la privacidad.Todo perfecto, como siempre!
El cuarto es muy amplio, todo esta siempre impecable siendo la comunicación clara y la disposición muy buena.
Todo muy bueno, exelente atención y predisposición,exelente ubicación

Al traspasar la puerta de la calle y el corredor, estarás trasladandote a un Buenos Aires de otra epoca. El dapartamento es el que ves en las fotos, el dormitorio es muy amplio con colchon y alhomadas muy confortables limpieza y orden impecables. Maria es la mezcla perfecta de educación, cordialidad y gentileza. Si vas en plan de turismo el subte esta muy cerca, la zona es segura y a 100 mts a la redonda encontraras  muchos lugares lindos para desayunar, almorzar, merendar y cenar. Muy recomendable!
Muy lindo y limpio el ph, excelente ubicación. Maria muy buena anfitriona, siempre predispuesta. Nos sentimos muy cómodos, lo recomendamos.
Pasé dos días fantásticos. Blanca una genia. María muy atenta. La casa hermosa. Buenos Aires increíble. Lo recomiendo!
reviews.response: Gracias Andrés! Sos siempre bienvenido en mi casa.

reviews.comments: Todo perfecto, Maria y su mamá muy amables y excelentes  anfitrionas. La habitacion es tal cual las fotos.
reviews.response: Gracias Valeria :) Sos siempre bienvenida.

reviews.comments: Nuevamente elegí la casa de María para disfrutar Buenos Aires. Excelente atención. Me sentí como en casa. Volvería sin dudarlo.
reviews.response: Gracias por volver Laura, sos muy bienvenida cuando quieras :)

reviews.comments: María es una persona exquisita, muy atenta y simpática, al igual que su madre. Pude entablar conversación con ambas y fue muy agradable.  La casa es preciosa, decorada con muy buen gusto, tal cual las fotos, con todas las comodidades.   El barrio de Recoleta es muy lindo y seguro. Volvería sin dudas!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tus comentarios, Laura! Sos muy bienvenida cuando quieras volver.

reviews.comments:
El lugar es muy cómodo, limpio y bonito. 
Se duerme muy bien. Mucho silencio y tranquilidad. 
El check in and out flexible es muy valioso y María se esmera en ayudar. 
Lo mismo Julián fue muy amable y de gran ayuda. 
La pasé muy bien. 
Gracias.

Departamento bello, limpio con una terraza exquisita. Buena ubicación.
María una linda persona. 
Feliz de haber pasado m noche previa a un viaje largo en este cómodo dpto.
La habitación esta limpia, amplia y bien iluminada, tal cual las fotografías, la zona es muy linda y bien ubicada para moverte por la ciudad.

Es un lindo lugar para quedarte, de muy buen gusto. Es fácil tomar transporte para cualquier lugar turístico que quieras visitar. María te da una linda bienvenida abriendo las puertas de su casa y confiándote las llaves.

Excelente ubicación... casi a todos lados nos movilizamos a pie, incluso por las noches, es un barrio bastante seguro y tranquilo. El subte está muy cerca.
Ricos y bellos cafés a pocos metros de la casa.
Sin duda, un lugar 100% recomendable.
Muchas gracias Maria y familia!

Hemos tenido con mi esposo una linda estadía en el hogar de María. El lugar está muy bien ubicado, sector residencial, tranquilo. María muy amable y dispuesta a ayudar en caso que lo necesites. La habitación cómoda, tal como se ve en las fotografías. Lo recomendamos de todas maneras.
Todo EXCELENTE!

He estado casi una semana en casa de María. La experiencia ha sido inmejorable.
La casa es tal cual se describe y se aprecia en las fotos, muy limpia, acogedora, tranquila y muy bien situada además de preciosa.
María en una muy buena anfritiona. No hemos podido compartir muchos ratos pero cuando así ha sido ha resultado tremendamente amable.
Altamente recomendable !!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Aitziber! Ha sido un placer tenerte en casa y siempre serás bienvenida nuevamente.

reviews.comments:
Nos recibió con una sonrisa desde el primer momento. Nos dio las facilidades de hacer early check in y late check out sin cargo adicional y fue super super atenta dandonos recomendaciones sobre a donde ir a comer y que visitar. 
Su mama y ella se preocuparon bastante por nuestra comodidad dandonos todas las facilidades para sentirnos como en casa. Tenian un monton de folletos que nos dejaron a la mano en la mesa de noche y estuvieron pendientes de ayudarnos en todo lo que necesitabamos, incluso Blanca nos ayudó consiguiendonos un taxi que nos llevara de regreso al aeropuerto 
Sobre las instalaciones, todo muy limpio. La cama muy comoda y el cuarto muy bonito. 
Definitivamente nos quedaremos ahi de nuevo!
reviews.response: Gracias Mariana! Espero que hayan tenido un buen viaje y sosnsiempre bienvenidos en mi casa.

reviews.comments:
La estadía donde María fue excelente, desde que la contacte estuvo dispuesta a ayudar en todo lo que necesitara para el viaje. 
La pieza es como se ve en las fotos, muy amplia y luminosa; el lugar cuenta además con una muy buena terraza en el piso superior.

Todo perfecto, ¡excelente!
La casa es una preciosidad, decorada con sumo gusto, muy limpia y confortable. María, su madre y su hermana fueron muy amables y atentas. Me envió varios documentos en pdf con información pormenorizada de la casa, la ciudad...
El barrio es un muy bueno,cerca del centro y muy bien comunicado por metro, bus y taxis.
Recomendable al 100%
reviews.response: Muchas gracias, Carlos! Ha sido un placer tenerte en casa, vuelve cuando quieras.

reviews.comments:
La casa de María es maravillosa. Bien ubicada y destaca por su simpleza y elegancia. Tanto María como su madre, fueron muy hospitalarias, desde el día que llegué (una hora de atraso) hasta el día que me fui. María es cálida y gentil.
Excelente estancia; gracias por todo.
reviews.response: Gracias por tus palabras, Claudio. Volvé cuando quieras!

reviews.comments:
Una gran experiencia! Fue nuestro primer viaje utilizando AirBNB y no nos pudo haber ido mejor. 
Encontramos en María a una anfitriona muy amable y bien dispuesta a ayudarnos con todo. Previo a la llegada la comunicación fue genial, nos hizo llegar un archivo en el que aparece todo lo que necesitás saber acerca de la zona, la casa y Buenos Aires en general. 
La casa es espectacular, 100 % coincidente con la descripción. La habitación es muy espaciosa y cómoda. Gran cama matrimonial, aire acondicionado, placares, tv y una muy linda terraza para tomar sol, comer algo ó simplemente disfrutarla. La ubicación es muy buena, a pocas cuadras del subte y muy próximo al Cementerio de la Recoleta, un lugar precioso.
Tuvimos una gran experiencia y en nuestro próximo viaje a Buenos Aires, repetiremos la estadía.
Muchas gracias María!
reviews.response: Gracias Federico :) Me alegro que se hayan sentido como en casa, son muy bienvenidos cuando quieran volver!

reviews.comments: Maria es una excelente persona, siempre esta dispuesta a ayudar y la habitación es muy cómoda.
reviews.response: Gracias Daniel :) Me alegro que hayas estado cómodo. Volvé cuando quieras!

reviews.comments: María vive en una casa muy bella, decorada por su madre que es arquitecto. He pasado un rato agradable con María y su pareja, son personas muy atentas, tomamos mate y tuvimos una excelente conversa. Mi estadía fue mi corta en su casa, pero no dejó de ser prolijo el rato que compartí junto a estas excepcionales personas. ¡Un abrazo! Nos vemos pronto.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por los comentarios, Jesus! :) Espero verte pronto de nuevo.

reviews.comments:
I will keep it simple... amazing place, 100% recommended.
The interior of the house is beautiful,  warm and big bedroom, and good location too. 
Maria was so nice! Very friendly, she keeps the house in immaculate conditions ...and she even welcomed us with churros (don't be jealous, maybe it was my lucky day) 
I wouldn't doubt to come here again in my next visit to Buenos Aires.
Maria is welcoming and friendly! She is flexible about check in and all. Really enjoyed staying there !

Maria is a great host who is very helpful and kind. Her place is gorgeous, and the room is enormous, fitted with a great bed. The balcony is cool and easily accessible. The place is also in a nice area of the city.  I’d recommend to anyone!
Beautiful place!
Ótimo local! Muito lindo, limpo e organizado! Eles também são muito queridos e gentis.
María was an excellent host. The room is even more beautiful than in the pictures. The location is perfect. I would stay again on a future trip to BA. Thanks Maria!
Maria is an amazing host! She has a very detailed and useful guide to the city which pretty much include everything you will need. Recommend!
An apartment of character, coquettish, calm in a commercial district close to the tourist and artistic points of BA. Geraldine speaks English easily, she is reactive and very pleasant.

Maria foi uma anfitriã impecável. Assim que fechamos o serviço ela mandou dicas da cidade. Tanto para turistas convencionais quanto para aqueles que querem sair do roteiro básico. 
Também informou sobre transporte e até disponibilizou o cartão do Sube, usado para pagar ônibus. 
Quando cheguei tinham água,cereal, leite e biscoitos para meu consumo, um gesto de grande dedicação ao hóspede
Destaque para a limpeza da casa (que é maravilhosa). O quarto é extremamente como na foto. Grande, arejado bem confortável. Voltaria e me hospedada na casa
De Maria outras vezes se ela me aceitar!
Fab place! Highly recommend. Better than a hotel

This is a great place to stay. Recoleta is a safe and pretty neighborhood in a central location. Maria gives her guests so much useful information before you even arrive. She sends a PDF explaining your options for getting from the airport (I took her advice!), and she mentions that you’ll have access to her subway card (to avoid buying a new one) as well as an adapter. There’s a gallon of purified water and light breakfast snacks for guests. The apartment is exactly as pictured (no unexpected suprises). My favorite part was the beautiful rooftop terrace accessible from the room. I didn’t get to meet Maria, but she checked in with me via text to make sure I had everything I needed, and her lovely mom let me in initially. I recommend Maria’s place for a comfortable stay in Buenos Aires. The only thing I’ll mention: bring bug spray for mosquitoe bites (you’ll likely need it anywhere you stay in the city).

Great place to stay ,lovely sunny balcony area.
Great location and very helpful host .lots of information in room about getting around BA

The house is a beautiful rearchitectured Recoleta epoch house, very bright and pleasant with the inherent noise echo of marble floors and staircases and a vertical built. It is well located and the neighbourhood is totally safe and pleasant.

Very spacious and homely. If I may say this place is a steal for the rate at which it's going. I'll be staying here whenever I'm in BA and Maria and her mother are very helpful too. Maria was quick with suggestions and was quick to respond and help with any query I had. She let me keep my bags even after checking out which was great for me and gave me time to explore the city until I was back in the evening when she called a cab for me to the airport.

I had a great stay at Maria's.  After a long-haul flight from London, it was the perfect place to unwind (wonderful roof terrace & big spacious room).  Really enjoyed staying in this neighbourhood (La Recoleta) and easy to visit the rest of the City - Maria's e-guide is so useful.  Maria's mother was the perfect host and made me feel very welcome and at home in Argentina.  Flexible check in and out very much appreciated.  My holiday in Argentina could not have gotten off to a better start!

La chambre que propose Maria est grande et claire avec une terrasse, sans vis à vis et qui donne accès à une autre terrasse plus élevée. Toute l'installation est moderne et confortable.
Le métro et les bus sont tout proches.
Quand Maria est en déplacement, sa maman Blanca prend la relève pour assurer une présence pour vous conseiller des choses à visiter ou des restaurants recommandables, ou pour des tas de discussions qui viennent dans la conversation. Julian le petit ami de Maria n'est pas en reste non plus.
Ce qu'offre Maria est exactement ce que j'attends d'un Airbnb: plus qu'un lit, un contact facile avec l'habitant.

Tres belle chambre avec un grand lit confortable et une terrasse. L'appartement est tres propre et décoré avec goût. Nous avons été tres bien accueillis et les hôtes se tiennent disponibles pour vous aider, conseiller. Nous avons testé plusieurs restaurants conseillés par Maria qui étaient tous excellents.

A casa da Maria é simplesmente fantástica em todos os sentidos. Está encrustada em um belo prédio antigo, como portas altas e puxadores dourados. Por sua vez, a arquitetura interna da casa é maravilhosa, como ambientes bem definidos, agradáveis, funcionais e com uma singular mistura entre o moderno e o antigo. O quarto é bastante espaçoso e bem iluminado, além do terraço, que apesar de me parecer pouco utilizado, é uma charme à parte. A localização é outro quesito a se destacar, uma vez que não precisamos pegar táxi para visitar alguns dos principais pontos turísticos de BA (Cimitério recoleta -20min; Teatro Solon e Obelisco - 40min; Casa Rosada - 50min etc). A maria ainda nos brindou com um grande roteiro de dicas de Bares, restaurantes, casas de shows, cafés e muito mais. Queremos retornar a BA e com certeza vou querer ficar na casa da Maria

Staying at Maria’s place was a great experience. The place is very tidy and spacious. Maria, his boyfriend and mother are very helpful and generous; plus offering a lot of info and suggestions. I highly recommend her place to stay.

We had a lovely time at Maria’s, everything was as expected by the photos and description. Maria was very rapid replying to our messages to coordinate the check-in and check-out. The house was clean, quiet and well located.

We loved our stay at Maria's apartment. It was a very nice apartment, in a great area. There are lots of nice restaurants in the nearby, and it was very easy to get around from there. The apartment was even more than we hoped for, and Maria was a great, and very organised host, who has everything covered to ensure that you will have a great stay. I do not hesitate in recommending Maria's apartment as a place to base yourself when visiting Buenos Aires.
Great host and a beautiful place to stay
Excellent location and warm reception with all the information one may need to get the best of Buenos Aires. Best cost benefit in the city, for sure. Tks , Maria.

The apartment is beautifully decorated and the neighborhood is very lively. There was a little bit of noise in the morning during my stay. :/ Also, probably because it's a colonial building, the water pressure in the shower was irregular. But all in all, it is a really beautiful apartment in a nice neighborhood with affordable price range. :)

First, the room was exactly what it was mentioned, clean, nice big room with terrace. Nice location and easy to get to the central city. Considering above the price is excellent, it helps for travelers like myself.

I heard noise from outside as school kids were walking past in the front every morning so if you are a light sleeper then you may have a problem.

Maria's mother was very nice, and she was waiting for me to arrive for check in. It took longer than expected since the transportation wasn't the best but Maria and her mother was worried about me and very kind that they wait for me.
It was also very nice that Maria offered me to arrange a taxi for me to go to bus terminal because it's not very safe around the time I was going to leave.

Overall, excellent quality and they made my stay great and comfortable. Thank you!!!

Wow! Maria's place is stunning and she is such a lovely host. Our flight was delayed but Maria waited up to greet us and show us where everything was, including where things were to get breakfast in the morning. She provided a great guide to the city and also was easily contacted for more personal tips that helped make our short stay amazing! 
The apartment is more of a house and beautifully decorated and impeccably clean and well presented: we didn't want to leave! Such amazing value, we were sad to leave! Definitely recommend if you want a fab place to stay.

We stayed with Maria for two days, one night and it could not have been more perfect! Her home is absolutely lovely and in the perfect location. The bed was one of the most comfortable beds :) Thanks for a great stay, Maria!

Maria's place is exactly like the photos. The apartment is immaculate, well located and comfortable . Maria speaks perfect English and has a very useful information leaflet for guests. Highly Recommended

Maria was such a lovely host! We arrived super early in the morning and Maria was awake to greet us and give us the tour. The house is beautiful, clean, and comfortable. We felt very at home and had a majority of the space to ourselves. The location was close to many bars, restaurants, and downtown attractions. We were sad to leave Maria's, but so glad we got to stay!

Maria foi super agradável! Tive um erro ao alugar no airbnb achando que estava alugando o apartamento, mas na realidade aluguei o quarto inteiro. Me preocupei no início porque precisava de privacidade para estudar para uma defesa de tese. Entretanto, Maria foi super gentil me proporcionando privacidade, conforto e espaço adequado para concluir o que necessitava. Fiquei muito bem em sua casa.
Amazing place with very kind host, Maria, as other guests mention. It made me fall in love with Buenos Aires.
Nice and big room. Maria was kind and helpfull. The apartment is very well located.
A beautiful home in the heart of the city.  Maria is a great host.

Absolutely beautiful Argentine home in Recoleta district of Buenos Aires. It was quiet, clean, cosy and very well located near to the metro lines. Maria was the perfect host and made our stay a very comfortable one. Would recommend highly!

Maria is a wonderful host and the location is perfect.  Communication was smooth and well organized.  I found the bed to be extremely comfortable which is always a plus! Maria's place is the perfect accommodation for Buenos Aires!

A truely amazing house, a lovely stay while visiting buenos aires! We would definitely recommend it. Maria and her mom are very friendly and helpful, we would have loved to have more time to talk to them: very nice people. The house is clean and had everything you need.

Maria's apartment is in one of the best neighbourhoods in BA. Being a solo female traveller, safety is of paramount importance to me and I was very comfortable walking alone at night back to the house from the bus stops on Santa Fe avenue.  Maria and her boyfriend are very welcoming yet gives enough personal space.  Her guide is very useful and I had some great meals in the restaurants she recommended.  The room is spacious and opens up to a central courtyard.  I would definitely recommend Maria's place if you are seeking comfort, convenience, safety and style.

Staying at Maria's was lovely!  Quite a unique home here in Buenos Aires and my time with Maria and her boyfriend Julien was very enjoyable, truly quality people.
Super easy for public transportation and nice neighborhood: clearly higher quality than my normal haunts in Polermo area for the many dance venues...
For tango dancing and sleeping during the day the room is rather bright and there is a school next door which is very active when the kids are out, but the airy room is great if you want a regular day schedule, and the weekends are quiet as school is out.  If u are sensitive to mosquitos, be aware they are here...
Gracias Maria, I very much enjoyed my time with you!❤️
This is a lovely place with a lovely host. I couldn't recommend this qaint, homely and super clean place highly enough. It was perfect.
Very nice place, nice neighbourhood, perfect location to visit the city. Maria is a very good host.

Loved it. The home is an incredible design and layout and you can tell Maria and her family have really great taste. Maria was such an amazing host. Very kind and helped us with booking restaurants and also her guide to the city was a great way to step off the tourist trail and live like a local. The location is good too with lots of places close by to eat, drink and be merry. The room is also something very special and a lot larger then the photos! Also it's connected to a rooftop which has a garden which we loved chilling out on after a day of touring. Highly recommend if you are in buenos aires. Thank you Maria for helping our trip get off to such an amazing beginning!

Maria's room was as advertised and even better. Clean, spacious, bright, comfortable in a beautiful house perfectly located to enjoy both local and touristic places. If you are planning a trip to Buenos Aires, I absolutely recommend staying here. Maria will also make you feel at home away from home.

Maria's place was lovely as well as being well-located. The bed was very comfortable and we especially appreciated (and needed) the air conditioning in our bedroom. We enjoyed a lengthy visit with Maria's mother, who was very interesting and helpful, and spoke excellent English. The few days we spent in Buenos Aires were unusually hot and the bathroom was not air conditioned, but otherwise we were very comfortable.

Nossa hospedagem na casa da Maria, foi ótima. Confortável, quarto grande, ar condicionado, TV, tudo que precisar. Casa muito bonita. Localização ótima, proxima de vários pontos turísticos e locais como bares e restaurantes. A duas quadras dá avenida Santa Fé. Sempre respondendo nossas dúvidas rapidamente. E montou um guia que tira muitas dúvidas e ajuda principalmente quem vai de primeira viagem.
Maria's place is a great and comfy place that makes you feel as if you were at home,  and on top of that she is a very sweet host. Thanks for having me!

Maria was a wonderful host and went out of her way to make sure I had a great stay (including waking up at 6am to welcome me to her home). Her apartment is beautiful (just like the photos), the bed is very comfortable, and the roof terrace was very nice. Thanks Maria!

Lovely colonial building with a homey tasteful décor, as host has lived there for years.  Good neighbourhood/ location, safe for women.   Lovely outdoor patio and rooftop.  Maria has been very helpful and thoughtful, her mum who lives nearby is very friendly too.

Maria has a beautiful classical style house with a good location in town, but still quiet and peaceful. It looks just like on the photo's. Maria's mother helped us with useful tips about public transport and what best to do on our short stay. She even helpt us arrange a taxi as our spanish was not very good. She spoke english very well. We had a great time and will recommend her accomodation to our friends.

Maria's place is perfectly described by her. Conveniently located, access to public transportation and within walking distance of many touristic places yet keeping the flavor of the locals. Room is private, clean and comfy. Maria gives you all the information you need when visiting Buenos Aires. The whole apartment is tastefully decorated and has nice places to enjoy and feel at home.  Highly recommend it!
reviews.response: Thanks for your comments Patricia! I'm glad you felt at home, you and your daughter are always welcome back.

reviews.comments: Had a very enjoyable stay. Very comfortable and spacious with stunning interiors and a beautiful  terrace. Maria's mum Blanco was staying and she could not have been more helpful. She was friendly, interesting and very informative. My only regret was that I could not stay longer. Alastair
reviews.response: Thank you Alastair! If you are back in BA the doors of my home are open for you and it would be great to meet you.

reviews.comments: We stayed 2 nights in this lovely spacious room and we really felt like home. Maria was super nice with us and the apartment was clean and well equipped. A glass of wine on the beautiful terrace is just what you need when you are back after a full day of walking and sightseeing in Baires! I certainly recommend this charming place.
reviews.response: Thank you Virginia! I am glad you had a good time :) You are always welcome back.

reviews.comments:
Exactly as shown.  Great location, lots of food options within the block. The stairwell is narrow to get up to your room, so ensure you can carry your bag up 2 flights of stairs. 
I would recommend. Worth the money for air con and good location.
reviews.response: Thanks for you comments Darci :) You are welcome back anytime.

reviews.comments:
This stay could not have been more perfect!
Maria is a wonderful host and person, so kind, flexible and helpful with everything!
The location is great, all the other neighborhoods being easily accessible from there.
And the house and room are amazing. I really felt cozy and at home since minute 1.
I definitely recommend you stay at Maria's charming place!
reviews.response: Thank you so much Juliette! You are always welcome in my place :)

reviews.comments:
Such a beautiful apartment in a great location in Buenos Aires. The apartment is in a beautiful, rustic Argentinian building but with a modern interior - with amazing sunlight all through the house. The bedroom is roomy with a very comftable bed. There is also a great rooftop terrace - perfect for breakfast first thing in the morning or a bottle of Malbec to end the day. 
Maria was a great host - giving us a guide to Buenos Aires, advice on things to do and space to feel at home in her apartment. 
Location was also really good. A train station is 2 minutes away to get where ever you need. But we mostly walked. Supermarket is around the corner. 
Thanks Maria, was a really amazing stay in Buenos Aires!
reviews.response: Thand you Matt! I'm glad you felt at home. If you ever come back to Buenos Aires, you are most welcome.

reviews.comments: My daughter and I had a lovely stay here for 3 nights. She has a beautiful home in a very convenient location on a peaceful tree-lined street. We loved the terraces too, and appreciated the warm welcome from Maria and her mother. Highly recommend!
reviews.response: Thanks Frances! I'm glad you had a pleasant stay, you and your daughter are always welcome back.

reviews.comments:
It´s a great place to stay in a nice neighborhood, really well located and with plenty of transportation means around.
The room is really spacious, clean, and full of light; also with AC for this summer days.
Both Maria and her mom were really nice and always available for advise and recommendations. She even made a guide by her self, including places to see and general tips about the city, and se sent it to me before my arrival, so i could plan my whole trip.
It is a great place to stay and everything was as promised, I really recommend it!
reviews.response: Gracias Enrique! Fue un placer tenerte y sos bienvenido cuando regreses a BA.

reviews.comments: Maria's place is in the best location to visit Buenos Aires. Her guide are precious informations to local restaurants and bars. She is super welcoming and extremely arranging. The house is precious and even better than the pictures. We had a great time and hope to visit again soon.
reviews.response: Thanks Émilie :) The doors of my home are always open if you ever come back to Buenos Aires.

reviews.comments: Central spot, great starting point for exploring the city. We loved Maria's guidebook and recommendations. Also enjoyed having a glass of wine on the terrace.
reviews.response: Thank you Andrea! I'm glad you enjoyed yourselves, you are always welcome back!

reviews.comments:
A Maria sempre foi muito rápida nas comunicações via email/app do Aribnb/(SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN).
Isso me deixou tranquila pois meu vôo de ida atrasou, e eu precisava avisar que chegaria bem mais tarde que o combinado.
A casa é ótima, o bairro muito agradável (perto de muitos cafés, mercado, farmácia, metrô e pontos de ônibus), e a Maria nos deixou confortáveis pra utilizar o espaço da casa (inclusive se ofereceu pra comprar comida no supermercado, caso quiséssemos).
reviews.response: Gracias Maira! Fue un placer tenerlos en mi casa, son siempre bienvenidos.

reviews.comments:
Maria is a great host. She made our stay perfect by sending all the informations you might need in advance before we left home. Her house is very comfortable and in a great and save area that we liked most of all the quarters in Buenos Aires. The bed is much bigger than 1,40, it's 1.60 and extremely comfortable. You don't want to leave it. The terrace is beautiful . There is so much to do in her area and in BA so you don't have enough time to relax on the terrace. You have access to her kitchen for breakfast which is great and also to the living room if you like to have a glass of wine before sleeping. Bakeries, supermarkets, restaurants all is just around the corner. And most of all Maria and Blanca her mother are very adorable and great people you should not miss to know.
One of our best airbnb experiences ever
reviews.response: Thanks for such an adorable review! It was great having you and I'd love to have you again any other time.

reviews.comments: Maria's house and the room/ bathroom is stunning, clean and exactly what you see in the pictures, the neighbourhood is so safe and her street is within walking distance to so many great things! Also her advice booklets are really helpful. Loved this place!
reviews.response: Thanks Georgia! It was great having you and you are always welcome back :)

reviews.comments: Thank you Maria for all your help! and the Apartment is ***** indeed!
reviews.response: Thank you, Felix! If you ever come back to Argentina I'll be happy to host you again.

reviews.comments: Maria was a wonderful host, and her home - in a traditional chorizo casa - a little paradise. Maria gave us a lot of good tips and was always very reactive when we had a question. She also gave us her self made guide with a selection of restaurants, bars, etc. The room is big, with a very comfortable bed, and connected to a roof terrace where we had breakfast. We had everything we need, the house was very clean. The neighborhood is quite calm and well connected to the subway and to a lot of buses on Santa Fe street. It's easy to go by foot in Palermo Soho, la Recoleta, etc. So, we loved our stay at Maria's and we highly recommend it !
reviews.response: Thank you! I'm glad you had a good time and you are always welcome back at my casa chorizo ;)

reviews.comments: Maria is a wonderful host. I really enjoyed my stay. Thanks a lot, Maria :-)! The apartment is gorgeous, with a lovely rooftop terrace, and the location is just perfect. I highly recommend staying here!
reviews.response: Thanks Verena! It was a pleasure having you and the doors of my house are always open for you :)

reviews.comments: Maria is very nice and kind host, she gave us so many useful advice and thank you so muchhhhh!
reviews.response: Thank you, Alice! Hope you had a great time, you are welcome back anytime.

reviews.comments: Beautiful place, located in a safe area of the city, at walking distance from mayor landmarks.  The apartment is tastefully decorated and the natural light coming from the  windows make the room feel spacious and cozy in the mornings.  Even thought we rent a room Maria allowed us to use the entire place.  She gave us a lot of info about the city and places of interest, she even booked a taxi from us for departure day.
reviews.response: Thanks Jorge! You are always welcome back if you return to BA.

reviews.comments:
I had been traveling solo for almost a month in South America and this home could not be a better place to end my trip. It really felt like I had visited a family home because that was how I was treated. My host Maria's was away for the first 2 days so her mum Blanca took care to ensure I settled in. I was immediately comfortable from the moment I stepped in. Maria had prepared a 'User Guide' for me that sat on my night stand that had more useful information relevant to the area and getting around. It was my life saver! The room reminded me of my own place - it had all the amenity and the comfort of a real home.  The house itself was stunning, I was really lucky to find this place and the location was so ideal. I was given a SUBE card to borrow but found it more convenient and interesting to walk everywhere yet feel safe. Once I was accidentally locked out of the home (clumsily my fault) and when I called for help Blanca rushed down the block from her busy day to let me in without questions when she had plans to be somewhere else. On the last day Maria even booked me a taxi and made sure I got the the airport and checked in that I arrived in Sydney. The hospitality from
Blanca and Maria was above and beyond my expectations and I have no hesitation recommending their quality home to anyone planning to stay in Buenos Aires. You will love this place!
reviews.response: Thanks for such a lovely review April! It was a pleasure hosting you, if you ever come back to Buenos Aires the doors of my home are open for you :)

reviews.comments:
I totally loved staying in this beautiful apartment that looks even more beautiful in real than in the photos. I stayed there for my first days in Buenos Aires while looking for a flat for longer terms and I could not have imagined a better start to my stay in Buenos Aires. The apartment is perfectly located, too - in a quiet but safe street with lots of shops, cafés and bakeries just around the corner. 
Maria was the most perfect host! She helped me with everything and even more. She is such a warm and kind person who makes you feel at home straightaway. Thank you so much, I'll see you soon :)
reviews.response: Thank you Kim! It was great having you at home, hope to see you again soon :)

reviews.comments: Maria is an awesome host. It was a rainy day when I arrived in BA but the apartment makes me to feel at home. Its a really comfortable room and the location is great. Subway station is just 5min to walk and there are some restaurants and bars. The apartment is really big and clean. She also gave me a lot of sightseeing tips and all information about the bars/restaurants/coffee around the place.
